about.title: About the event
about.subtitle:
The invasion of Russian troops into Ukraine and the third year of full-scale war have become a shock that requires extraordinary efforts at the local government level to effectively respond to military threats and adapt life support systems to blackouts and other challenges. Community resilience is the ability of local governments and residents to survive, adapt, and grow, regardless of the long-term threats they face.

Ukrainian Resilience Week is a platform for expert discussions, inspiring stories, and promoting the interests of local governance in building resilience.

list.event: Offsite Meeting of the Verkhovna Rada Committee on Energy, Housing and Utilities
Laying flowers on Mars Field for the Defender of Ukraine Day
Cities Resilience and recovery
IX Lviv Eco Forum
list.description: The IX Lviv Eco Forum is dedicated to the topic of ensuring community resilience in the face of potential blackouts this winter. Together with representatives from central government authorities, mayors, humanitarian organizations, and financial institutions, we will discuss how to survive, adapt, and thrive under military aggression, regardless of the future threats faced by urban infrastructure.

list.event: Heat Energy Forum
Online side event: "Resilient cities of Ukraine. Supporting communities in planning resilient development
Public discussion on city resilience: "Combating disinformation in the energy sector
IX Lviv Eco Forum
Lviv Eco Forum 2024 Waste Management
list.description: «Lviv Eco Forum 2024: Waste Management» will feature presentations from leading specialists from across Ukraine and Europe, and an exchange of experiences with representatives of city authorities, the public sector, and environmental initiatives. The forum serves as a platform for discussing and developing joint solutions to foster the creation of a modern waste management system in Ukraine.

list.event: Heat Energy Forum
list.description: A platform for professional dialogue, exchange of experience, and knowledge sharing between experts, scientists, business representatives, and government authorities to ensure stable and reliable heat supply in Ukraine amidst the current challenges caused by Russian aggression.

list.event: Forum «Financial Sustainability and Economic Development of Communities»
list.description:
A platform for exchange of experiences and ideas on strengthening the financial foundation of local governance and stimulating the economic development of cities.

Best European practices in attracting additional sources of funding for cities

list.event: XV Allukrainian Condominium Forum
list.description: The All-Ukrainian Condominium Forum is the main event of the year in the field of housing and communal services in Ukraine. It serves as a platform for finding joint solutions to urgent issues for condominiums and the management of multi-apartment buildings overall.
